titleStmt.title: By the Queene. A proclamation agaynst maynteyners of seditious persons, and of trayterous bookes and writinges
Proclamations. 1570-11-14
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: In Povvles Churchyarde by Richarde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Queenes Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: A proclamation against those who support the seditious practices of fugitives and rebels who scatter traitorous books and speeches and ordering all to be diligent to suppress these.
At bottom of sheet: Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
